name: Rock Paper Scissors Online (mcmityler)
description:
SERVER MAY NOT BE RUNNING AT ALL TIMES!

if server is not running, full project download will be available on my github if you want to check it out.

Known Bugs:

  • If one client is able to update while one lags behind it is possible for it to get out of sync

My Accomplishments while making / What I learned:

  • Learned how to use EC2 instances and AWS
  • Learned python
  • Learned how to make a server/online based game using a elastic IP
